data.actual_result: The preview flashes newer messages for a split second before showing the mention
data.expected_result: The preview loads with the mention at the top
data.short_description: Opening a recent mention preview that is not near the bottom of chat flashes newer messages when loading the preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a recent mention that has a lot of messages sent after the mention (Using one from several hours ago should work) - Open your recent mentions drawer - Tap on a mention to open the preview - Observe the messages as the preview loads
